alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant; Keith; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 9:13PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL ARTHUR...SOUTHERN GRANT...NORTHERN KEITH AND WEST CENTRAL MCPHERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/... At 913 PM CDT/813 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arthur, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Arthur around 820 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include H!** YOU DID NOT Saythorn Lake, Green Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Three Mile Lake, Bucktail, McKeag and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 108 and 131. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 182. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
